page_content:
Altodigital Networks Limited

Cloud Print Services

This service is specifically designed to support and host a managed print or managed document environment. It supplements a normal managed print environment by providing SaaS services related to Managed Print/Document Services.

Features

  • Cloud Print Services
  • Hosted Document Workflow
  • Outsourcing and Management of Entire Print Services
  • Device Monitoring
  • Print Policy Enforcement
  • Scalable Document Environment
  • Virtualisation for the Print Network

Benefits

  • No need for onsite print servers
  • Virtualisation for print
  • Streamline your print network and reduce operational overhead
  • Create a more responsive document environment
  • Release Resources devoted to print fleet management
  • Deliver Sustainability
  • Take Control
  • Drive User Productivity
  • Reduce Print Costs

Pricing

£432.8 per instance per year

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Other
  • Trial option available

Service documents

  • pdf document: Pricing
  • pdf document: SFIA rate card
  • pdf document: Service definition
  • pdf document: Terms and conditions
